note.p: Birth: Ivanovka, Kharkov Province, Russia (15 or 16 May 1845)
Research Field: Embryology, comparative anatomy, pathology, bacteriology, immunology
Medals/Prizes: Copley Medal 1906; Nobel Prize (Physiology or Medicine) 1908
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1915-1917 vol 89 pp li-lix signed by E R L
References: Anne Cooke, 'From Microbes to Man. Ulf Lagerkvist, Pioneers of microbiology and the Nobel Prize' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 234-236
Notes: DSB gives birth date as 16 May 1845
